participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Ethan is always looking for new opportunities to advance his career.
participant_1.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Samantha Lee
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and diligent, Samantha is dedicated to her patients and loves to spend her free time outdoors.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park.
